buildCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup default nightly && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install trunk && trunk build --release
installCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup default nightly && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
